website_summaries.verdict: Provides good versatility in a TENS unit with 20 strength levels and 12 modes.
pros: Fully compliant with CD, FDA, and RoHS standards
Unit allows you to set the usage time between 10 and 60 minutes
12 usage modes, and to select 20 different strength levels
Features 8 reusable pads for precise placement
cons: Longevity is a big question mark with failures reported after several uses

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for Sciatica patients.
customer_reviews.text: OMG this helps so much. I have a cyst in my spine that my neurosurgeon has declined to remove due to the location near to my spinal cord. I have three bulging discs that are excruciating at times. I received this TENS unit this morning. I never should have waited so long to purchase this. I have used this all day long, off and on. It has the necessary number of leads to reach all of the sciatic pain areas. If you have sciatica pain, please try this.
customer_reviews.author: LRisk4Cats

customer_reviews.title: Great product/Great seller
customer_reviews.text: My doctor suggested a portable Tens unit for my lower back pain. I picked this one because it has a rechargeable battery. I put it on my back as soon as the package was delivered to my office.It has several modes, with several levels and adjustable intensities. It works wonderfully. I discovered that one of the pads had a defective snap. I contacted the seller, and they shipped out a replacement set of pads. I received the replacement pads today, and they are perfect. I would recommend this product and seller to anyone looking for a good quality tens unit.
customer_reviews.author: leannj1970

customer_reviews.title: I have herniated and degenerative discs in my lower back ...
customer_reviews.text: I have herniated and degenerative discs in my lower back. I went with my husband to a very large trade show where there is lots of standing and walking. This TENS unit saved my life, actually it saved my back and legs and gave me much peace of mind as we waked several miles for 3 days during this show. I placed the larger pads on each side of my spine and let it do its job. It truly helped the pain in my lower back and down each leg that I experience when I've been on my feet for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Nix

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Device
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this item. It arrived fully charged, which was awesome because I was able to put it on my sore back immediately. Been wearing it daily for four days and only lost one battery bar so far. It has multiple settings, though I only like two of them. You can also crank this baby up pretty high, I haven't even gone past half power and it gets intense! Provides great relief of my tight, sore muscles and allows me to move around more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: jena_21

customer_reviews.title: Horrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: I mean you're paying more than $30 for this product and they can't even get simple instructions correctly? The instructions book is very small with extremely small font with half the page blank. They could've just filled the rest of that page with a bigger font. Product works but for this price is pathetic and shouldn't be in this range if the instructions don't even work. The instructions don't even tell you how to operate different modes. It just shows you what the thing comes with! Also I can't believe that the charger just comes with a cord and no wall brick. Including a wall brick doesn't even cost much considering how cheaply made the product already is.
customer_reviews.author: Doniel

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this thing. My husband has neck pain and this takes it away. Things he loves compared to other units. Nice size for bringing along anywhere. Battery life is amazing Love that you can charge it instead of having to use regular batteries Love the connectors to the pads. A big improvement over other units we've used. Just hope the pads aren't hard to find replacements for. Haven't looked yet. Easy to use Great price
customer_reviews.author: M. Beachy

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit, could use updates to design.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for months, and it works great! The only issues I have are that there aren't great pictures to explain how every setting will feel. I spent the first hour or so trying to figure out which setting was right for my pain. A booklet or something should be provided with explanations of each of the pictures/settings.
customer_reviews.author: BlackRoseHeart

customer_reviews.title: It worked only 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: After fully charged, I used it. It only worked 10 minutes and turn off. I try to charged again but no lights in the screen. It didn’t work again. Now I have to pay for the return 53 usd plus 32.87 for the unit and they say that they are going to give me only 20 usd for the return so I’m going to lose money for a defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge humberto Esquivel H

customer_reviews.title: An amazing little device!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this TENS for about 3+ weeks, "practiced" with it a couple of times to understand its options, and have used it about 20 times; and I still don't have to change the stick-on pads! They continue to adhere and conduct the mild current. While the process does not "cure" my sciatica and other assorted pains/aches, it does interrupt them, and I have less discomfort for a good while after use. It's also quite reasonable in price. I am thinking of purchasing a second one for a famiiy member.
customer_reviews.author: Dawg mom

customer_reviews.title: Super duper tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! The directions are written to where you have to have a magnifying glass to read them. Once you start playing with the machine either you will get really shocked or relaxed by it. It just depends on how many times you push the intensity button. I use this on my back for lower back pain. My face for a non surgical facelift and my abs because I will never find them in the kitchen. It really does work great! I’m super impressed by it.
customer_reviews.author: Mendy J. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Good if you don’t get a lemon
customer_reviews.text: On first day I got it one of the pads wouldn’t come off and the cord broke into the pad. Then one of the nodes on another cord didn’t even work. Using the other pads and another cord it works great. Strong enough, plenty of modes, quality pads. Interface is terrible, instructions aren’t very good. But after quick read and playing around the first session you’ll get the hang of it. Reviews that say it isn’t strong enough either not correct placement of pads or got a poor quality device. I’m returning mine and getting another hopefully better luck like most because should work well when it works.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence J. Gold

customer_reviews.title: I Love ❤️ the Ease of Setting Up the Device and the Number of Options I Am Able to Choose From!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a Tens unit for about 10 years for lower SI Joint Issues, Sciatica, and neck pain due to slipped disks and bone spurs. I am allergic to most prescribed pain medication and these units have been a life saver. Many times, I wear one while working since I’m on my feet for work. I finally wore my older unit out that was “old school” and I purchased this new mini massager from TEC.BEAN. I am delighted that this is a pre-programmed device and that I will No longer have to mess with different dials b
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't receive the unit that's advertised but instead received the one in the review pictures. Pads don't stick well at all. When both leads are plugged, I can barely feel the 2nd. Sending mine back!!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIE SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: I'm addicted to this!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from acute sciatica. I follow home remedies like cold/hot compress but I was getting a bit impatient because I still couldn't go by my usual day. Thankfully I found this, now I just keep it on my lower back and attach/detach the cords when I use them! So easy to use and it really works! I'm also amazed at its battery life. I can take it with me anywhere and not worry about needing to recharge. Since I received this item 5 days ago I only charged it once, use it everyday more than 3 times, and only 1 bar exhausted. Pretty good and reliable!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Women on Menstrual Cycle
customer_reviews.text: This device is amazing !! I tend to have severe cramps during my period in which the pain spreads throughout my back. The massager has two plug-ins for the wires, so you can simultaneously apply a pair of pads to your back AND your stomach. First of all, it almost completely distract me or get rid of the cramping pain. Secondly, my back has felt much better since using this item. Bonus is that I can even use it during work since it's so small !
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cai

customer_reviews.title: It works!!! 💖
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for a da y, and I LOVE it!!! I have endometriosis and it's helped me get through work today. (Which consists of standing on concrete for 7 hours straight) Get one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lea Morissette

customer_reviews.title: Love the different modes and the different levels
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent. I have been dealing with a shoulder issue for four months now. Hurts to move it. MRI indicated no tears, no structural issue, so the verdict was neck impingement. My first use of this on my deltoid and the trapezuis created the first moments of freedom in months. I'll continue to use until this impingement corrects. Will use for future muscle aches. Love the different modes and the different levels. Was very comfortable at a level 4 for the first session. The higher levels were intense. Good product. Battery level seems to hold well. Love that it is rechargeable and portable.
customer_reviews.author: YInman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the product 1 day, but it is awesome! It was fully charged when I received it, so I attached the leads and turned it on. A lot of the modes feel the same, but I think the accupuncture is the best. It has plenty of power on power level 4 or 5. I have used it for 8 total hours at 20 minute intervals and the battery is still full. When registering the product it didn't recognize my order number, but customer service was very fast and responsive at getting it registered. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Small, portable with lots of options
customer_reviews.text: Today is day one and I immediately opened the product. Instructions were easy and I was able to use it within minutes. I felt immediate relief to my achy muscles in my neck and shoulders. I have a work from home office job and I always feel tension in my neck and shoulders. This helps eliminate it without having to ask my husband to massage my shoulders and neck constantly. I also used on my shoulder and knees and I feel like a new person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great for TMJ pain
customer_reviews.text: TENS is the only genuine relief I’ve ever gotten for my TMJ disorder pain. This particular unit is far better than one I had purchased at the drug store for twice the money. And I love that it’s rechargeable because batteries are too expensive. It comes with clear instructions, USB charger, a variety of electrode pads, and a carrying pouch so you can take it on the go. I really really do like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: philly_dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: 6 month at best on 2
customer_reviews.text: I've been using tens effectively for 9 plus years now and had only bought 2 in this time until they stopped manufacturing my old o e and got this new one in January 2020. I forgot it at home qgile I was in Alaska half this year and putchased another there. Was excitedto have one in both locations. EXCEPT with all the busyness this summer I hardly got to use either. Oct 8 2020 neither of them now work! DEAD! THEY MUST OF HAD COVID19. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Chargeable Tens unit with multi- modes!
customer_reviews.text: I had a different Tens unit for many years. It served the purpose then. This Tens unit is so much better more modes which I found great to experiment with to find a comfortable feeling. Love the multiple pads and that they snap on. I love the screen for changing modes. It shows as best it can the feeling of the mode. It is chargeable which is a plus! Last one used batteries, bad idea! It is lightweight and slim, that is nice, fits right into a pocket. It does not have a clip on which kind of sucks, last one did.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: My very old TENS unit finally died after 15 years, so I chose this one to replace it. It takes me a little while to figure out which option to use, because none of the graphics make sense to me, but once I take a while to try different ones, I get the right one, and this really helps whatever I'm trying to relieve, whether a sore shoulder or my ankle broken years ago that still gets inflamed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have used it a handful of times already and it does an amazing job at relaxing and easing my muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: I was in physical therapy for a while for back pain and they used a unit similar to this as part of the therapy and since it helped so much I decided to try one at home. This machine is such a steal for the price. I have used it a handful of times already and it does an amazing job at relaxing and easing my muscle pain! Definetly would recomend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed this tens unit from a friend when I had a frozen shoulder. At first I wondered if such a small unit would give me the proper intensity. But this thing is a champ! I love it, so I bought my own unit. It has an impressive long lasting rechargeable battery. Very compact for travel and comes with a nice pouch.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my tennis elbow
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor was connecting me to a tens unit along with doing ultrasound at the office to help with tennis elbow. I got this unit so I wouldn't have to go back as often and see if I could get rid of the tennis elbow sooner. The battery life has been great, it's incredibly strong (i've only been using setting 3-4 out of 20), and there are so many pulse options. I highly recommend this unit. Also it's been about a month but I think my tennis elbow problem is pretty much gone.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Great Tens Unit Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Tens Unit, I have on going back problems and this does the trick. I use it on my back, shoulders, it works great, saves me from going to the chiropractor. Pads are super sticky when you get them after a few uses they get better. It actually feels like the one the chiropractor uses in his place. I am going to purchase one for a friend for her birthday. Several different frequencies to pick from. It's a great little piece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT TENS MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: I love this TENS machine. It's powerful, soothing and it's portable! Thankfully I don't have any major aches or pains but I like to keep a TENS machine in the house in case I have overdone things and need natural relief. If nothing else, just sitting down and watching TV with this soothing machine on my shoulders is sooooo relaxing! I would recommend this particular TENS machine to anyone. Works great and is a great value buy!
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price. Just don't bother trying the smallest pads, they don't stick.
customer_reviews.text: I have shoulder impingement syndrome in my right arm. I was sent to PT to get it straightened out and found out that the TENS unit they use gives me the most relief, so I picked this one up to try at home. I've been using it religiously for the last 3 days since I got it and it does offer some relief. The only thing I don't like is that the small pads just don't stick and are not even worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: J. L.Shillingburg

customer_reviews.title: Could be good..... needs more work.
customer_reviews.text: The first week of using this unit was amazing!!!! Then well the pads stopped sticking and any wrong move they became detached from wire. DO NOT GRAB FOR IT!!! TURN IT OFF FIRST!!! It will SHOCK you. If they could create a better sticky pad and button it would be great. Now after a few weeks I don’t use it, it just falls off my back.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Helper for Pain
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product today and I’ve had ongoing nerve pain that makes it difficult to stand or sit for long periods of time. My acupuncturist recommended me getting one of these and it has removed the nagging pain I had this morning upon its initial use. I also have lower back pain so I will follow up how well this works after a few months use. So far, I’m very happy with this product that makes it easy to use at home, or at work.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Bon

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it is a TENS, not jus a muscle stimulator
customer_reviews.text: I did not find anything on the product that indicates it is a TENS unit. TENS is a specific kind of stimulator with frequencies that work on nerves, which is different that units, such as EMS, that work on muscles. This looks like one of those generic products sold at CVS. I need a TENS. I hope I am wrong about this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Robert rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying 2 of these because the first one was a hit with my mother and afterwards it was a hit with my aunt. It’s surprising the power this small item has. It came with a nifty carrying pouch and it has been put to good use so far as I know. In terms of versatility it’s not such a big difference with all the different modes to me but then again it’s so powerful I couldn’t try it beyond level 3. Perhaps for the average user this won’t even matter since it gives the desired stimulation. I’ve had no complaints from my loved ones.
customer_reviews.author: KayMac

customer_reviews.title: ... to arthritis and I must say that it works great on my knee
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit because I suffer from severe knee pain due to arthritis and I must say that it works great on my knee . I love the fact that it has several different settings and small enough to carry with you in the nice little bag that comes with it. I am very pleased with it and would recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Shunka36

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if this will help with my slipped disc inflammation that is causing sciatica but it feels like it’s alleviating some of the pain! I suggest buying the gel for Tens units too. The pads have their own gel that dissipates with each use so the extra gel will prolong their life.
customer_reviews.author: VeeJ

customer_reviews.title: Feels as good as the one at physical therapy
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed having something like this at physical therapy, I like being able to use it at home. I am still trying to figure out how to access all the modes, There are six circles but the directions say there are 16 modes from. Maybe tech-support will be able to help me, I still like what I have been able to do though
customer_reviews.author: Bookseller92

customer_reviews.title: Worked once
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for the first 40 minutes, then, nothing... Tried everything to make it work again. As I was finally giving up and about to take it off, it gave me a huge shock! Probably just a faulty item, but moving on to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: kat2u23

customer_reviews.title: sucks because i could have really liked it
customer_reviews.text: please be careful if you have heart issues, high blood pressure, hypertension. it literally chocked me last night. and i was only on level 1. sucks because i could have really liked it. but i could not breathe after only having it on for 3 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Chery

customer_reviews.title: Good...
customer_reviews.text: The pads are sticky...but eventually will lose their stickiness....I guess you can use medical tape to hold them on when that happens. The manual has mode-display that does not match what's on the device...things are out of order...but that's ok... It's pretty strong for a little thing. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: vickun

customer_reviews.title: Updated to Good
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem 3 months in, but they replaced my unit with a newer model. The new system works great. I only gave 3 stars because my 1st unit had a key lock so I could not change the settings by accident and the new system does not :/ Overall a very effective pain management system.
customer_reviews.author: Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This works better than my cheap tens units. I bought extra pads just incase and I am glad I bought this. So far it works great, I have an issue with one pad not sticking. I have fibromyalgia and severe pain in my shoulder and surprisingly this works with helping my pain. If you want something small and easy to use this is worth buying. I am very happy with my purchase and I'm surprised I havent bought one of these before.
customer_reviews.author: ilia

customer_reviews.title: Recently went to Chiropractor & he recommended I get a unit like this.Can't beat the price & quality of this one.Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Been having mild/severe middle to upper back, and shoulder problems, off & on for a few years. Been to a couple of Chiropractor's & one of them recommended getting a unit like this. Glad I did. Definitely helps more than any of the OTC pain relief medications I'd been using. Comes with plenty of pads & cords. Pads stick very well, and are easy to remove when finished. Battery is great (still haven't had to charge it yet out of the box). Very easy to apply pads & can use device while walking around, lying down or sitting. Great price, quality and size of unit. Highly recommend this particular tens unit to anyone suffering from any sort of chronic pain.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit for my sister who is in constant pain. She started using it yesterday. It is easy to set up and looks like it will be a good unit. The only way to tell if it is effective is to give it time to work and at that it can not make the pain go away for every user but it seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has experienced intermittent lower back pain for greater than ten years. Each time he would go to the chiropractor, which always involved multiple visits for several consecutive weeks. As part of treatments, he received TENS therapy. I purchased this unit as an adjunct to his professional treatments. Much to my surprise, he has totally been able to circumvent the chiropractor almost totally! Saving us hundreds and hundreds of dollars. We’ve had the unit for nearly two years, and only one very severe episode required professional treatment from the chiropractor. The unit is exceptionally easy to use. I would highly recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Sugar

customer_reviews.title: Unit works great.
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great. The stimulation goes from very small to very intense. You control what feels good to you. They give you a nice variety of pads sizes. For the money you can't beat it. The instructions could be a little more comprehensive, but with a little playing and trail and error you will figure out how to use it. The rechargeable battery is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good compact unit
customer_reviews.text: The product works very well but after one use one set of leads already doesn’t work. I have not contacted customer service yet to see about help so I can’t comment on that yet. Otherwise the product has very good strength and several different settings that are helpful. The charge lasts for several uses which is great not to have to keep charging. It came fully charged so I was able to use it right away which was nice. As long as customer service is helpful with the initial problem I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: ENL

customer_reviews.title: nifty little gadget
customer_reviews.text: this was charged and ready to use upon arrival. and arrival was less than 24 hrs after ordering, impressive amazon. got this to help relieve shoulder and back pain/sciatica. experimented with the different modes, very interesting. looking forward to using on regular basis. oh, and the price was hella inexpensive!
customer_reviews.author: Snoop

customer_reviews.title: Gets me through the day when I'd otherwise be laid up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the money! With all the different settings - patterns and intensity, I can change it up throughout the day to keep me going. I'm an inpatient nurse, so when my back is tweaked, it is enough to get me through my day! Twelve hour shifts are a real test and this TENS passed the test!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D

customer_reviews.title: Incredible! This unit worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I was in so much pain from my back compressing a nerve running down my quad muscle. I couldn't sleep due to the pain. From the first night I got instant relief. I sometimes have to sleep all night with the unit on. The pads are very comfortable. The battery lasts a long time, in fact I have been using the device for over a week and I have not charged the batteries yet. I have recommended this unit to family members with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: works great but pads aren't very sticky
customer_reviews.text: unit works great but the pads need to be stickier plus there was a card inside that said you are entitled to get free pads but it wouldn't let you order them, so that is why i gave it a 4 stars! If promised me something, I'm looking for the free pads. Plus Pads aren't as sticky as I would like
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for multiple family members!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to try - read that TENS could help with menstrual cramps. She said that it did - made for a very happy teenager. My husband was also able to use it for leg pain. It’s a nice little unit, with many accessories and options. My only criticism is that it would be nice to have clearer instructions, with explanations for the different modes. There’s a bit of a learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product and is VERY easy to use. So if you are not sure , this one is easy to test settings. And you can always contact a physical therapy place and see if you can make an appointment for them to show you what settings are good for your problem areas. My last one was prescribed about 8 or 10 years ago and was more complicated. Now since prices have become so cheap, insurance may not cover it. This is definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical but now amazing fan!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I was somewhat skeptical but decided the investment was minimal relative to my pinched nerve pain in my shoulder. Please believe me when I say I am overwhelmed at how great this small but powerful device is! It is the size of an older small iPod, has multiple modes within each setting, a rechargeable battery, and delivers unbelievable relief. Really...unbelievable. I went to a chiropractor two days ago and this device far surpasses the relief I received from that visit. If you have muscle soreness or need relief from pain, please try this device. You will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: JH07

customer_reviews.title: I Need one for my husband and son!
customer_reviews.text: Initially this was my machine but my husband and son have confiscated it! We love it, the pads stick great, and it helps with the pain from my bulging discs that are punching the nerves. The only thing I do not like it that the directions and placements if it's at limited and not detailed, but not difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan & Amy Stein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I would give this thing 10 stars if I could. I have been experiencing horrible back pain and spent hundreds of dollars at the chiropractor trying to alleviate my pain. After using something similar to this TENS unit at the chiropractor I would feel a little relief so I decided to purchase one for myself to use at home during the evening and weekends. This has been so much more effective and cost saving. I would highly recommend this item to anyone with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Too complex of a Unit
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the complexity of trying to figure out how to use it. And the instructions are in such small font you need a magnifying glass to read them.
customer_reviews.author: CeeF

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: Takes time to get used to. I have tight muscles in legs and hips and need to supplement stretching exercises.still too soon to judge helpfulness. Update: I’ve been using the unit for several weeks, now. It’s great to use after my stretching exercises. I’m still trying out the different modes, but haven’t used any that I haven’t liked. Being able to upper and lower back at the same time is an added bonus. Kudos for the long lasting charge.
customer_reviews.author: Formerteach

customer_reviews.title: Small, portable, long lasting rechargeable battery, multiple pads
customer_reviews.text: I am using this device when my PCOS is kicking bad and I am amazed by the efficiency of it ! I have been able to reduce my ibuprofen intake by more than half thanks to this ! It does help my husband as well right now after a rib dislocation... Strong, portable, long lasting rechargeable battery, multiple massage pads
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: So far it seems great
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to chance to really play with it much yet, but I'm impressed with the size and the quality feel of it. I thought it would be much bigger; I'm excited to see it's so portable and well made. I'll update my review once I've been able to use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great device for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with lower back pain for 4+ years now, and the use of a "tens" device seems to help. When my last unit died, I found this one, and it is a terrific device. Nice packaging, great storage sack, and it works really well. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Ek Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This small unit packs a lot of power and options.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical of a TENS unit at such a reasonable cost. My fears were allayed the first time I tried it. This AS1080 has 6 main modes for massages for different areas of the body and a total of 16 varieties/smaller modes to choose from. There are 10 intensity options and you can adjustthe massage time from 10 minutes to 60 minutes. I suffer from lower back pain and sciatica and this unit helps me just like my trips to the acupunturist and I can use it anywhere and anytime.. The unit charges quickly with the USB included cable and the the different size pads fit anywhere on the body. Very happy and I do recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Demsey

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: Just received in mail, removed from the box, plugged in wires, attached pads, stuck to arm and bam, works like a charm! Didn't even look at the directions yet! Feels just like at physical therapy! Great price, fast free Amazon prime shipping, easy to use straight out of box and warranty website chat specialist helped me setup the warranty!!! All around great experience, thanks Nikko!
customer_reviews.author: NatJones

customer_reviews.title: A Tens as GOOD as it Gets!
customer_reviews.text: I owned a tens unit in the late 90’s following a head on collision. Eventually it stopped working. I have tried other unfits after that one, but could not find a great one until now! The Tec.Bean Tens Unit is great! I love the settings, the size, the settings, the LED screen. It is as good as it gets!
customer_reviews.author: C.M. DECUIR

customer_reviews.title: Little product packs SO MUCH PUNCH! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best money I think I’ve ever spent. This exceeds all expectations. Being a hairstylist on top of having scoliosis, I have chronic upper body pain and I first was introduced to tens units by my chiropractor. I went ahead and ordered this unit and have been able to cut back on chiropractic care significantly, and I get relief anywhere I am. I love that this is rechargeable and all the different modes help depending what kind of pain I’m experiencing. Would HIGHLY recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CariLawson

customer_reviews.title: Nice small tens unit.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for lower back pain relief. The pain relief works just like any other tens unit. It’s nice and small if you want to fit it in your pocket and I like that it’s rechargeable. Some things I didn’t like though if the pads will not last long. Maybe a few uses. Also tried to go on the website for the product and the page has been deleted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Keep on Working
customer_reviews.text: I use it every morning for my joints, it just keeps on working. I've only charged it once. My joint pain is always gone after using this. I never use high, about half way and I'm there. A very good investment for joint pain. I bought the extra pads too and yes I'm onto my 2nd set. The jell is also a good thing to buy. Its no pills pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: LoveDogs

customer_reviews.title: Quick relief that is making a big difference!
customer_reviews.text: I am a thorough researcher and read many reviews for an at home TENS unit. My top criteria for an at home unit included a re-chargable battery, compact size and one with a variety of settings. This unit is working! I have damaged my rotator cuff and everyday tasks like sitting at a computer and sleeping have been so hard until now. This unit is so simple to use and provides much needed relief in the right spots. Loved the user guides - helped to ensure proper set up! My healing process in my shoulder has been expedited with it's use and I couldn't be happier I invested in this unit.
customer_reviews.author: dsamer

customer_reviews.title: Great at the beginning
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great at the beginning. Now it shuts off every 2-5 mins. Really disappointed that it doesn’t work properly after a year. My other one lasted me 4 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this mainly to use on my forehead during bad migraines. It does help me with migraines
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to use on my forehead during bad migraines. It does help me with migraines, my sister has a similar product that came from Canada and was much more expensive. I am pleased with this product and the way it works. My husband has already taken over it for use of sore muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cramps!
customer_reviews.text: The smaller pads it comes with do not work well at all and after one use they didn’t stick well but I bought these for terrible period cramps. I’m usually unable to move for two days and suffer from ovarian cysts. This helped with my pain tremendously and I was up and moving around like normal. I would suggest this for anyone with terrible cramps!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: WORKS as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely device that performs as advertised for headache, backache, and menstrual cramps. I purchased this when my Livia device failed during our holiday trip. I found it as effective, but far less expensive. I have a Cefaly device as well, but this device would serve equally well, just a bit more bulk, but overall more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: jm_rives

customer_reviews.title: Best Pain Medicine
customer_reviews.text: I have a injury to my neck due to a filing cabinet falling on my head and caused damage to a bunch of vertebraes. I have been wanting one for so long and so thankful I found a affordable one to help me when I am in pain and i don't have to take medication
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rakes

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this one because the name brand one was ridiculously priced. I use this for my monthly, which i literally used on my day one and after 30 mins my really badddd cramps died down. What i didnt expect is not getting those cramps back at all for the reas of my monthky!!! I used it also for my bad Sciatica (spelling) lower back bain and it worked also.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly powerful, holds a great charge
customer_reviews.text: I made this order as a low risk, what the hell give it a try impulse buy. I couldn't be happier. This device delivers all the power I can handle and a little more. It supports up to 6 pads and the various programs are really different and have great effects. It charges pretty quickly and a full charge lasts for numerous treatments. Came with a nice set of pads.
customer_reviews.author: ImMrBill3

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit!! Compact and will easily fit in your pocket. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY glad I purchased this unit. I’ve dealt with sciatic pain for several years which had recently gotten worse. This unit has helped my pain immensely!! I love the way I can set the timer to how long it stays on. I would definitely recommend it to anyone dealing with pain!!!
customer_reviews.author: ldzornes

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the size. It's a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great TENS unit. The battery lasts forever, I've used it for 6-7 hours on a low-medium setting and it still had plenty of battery left, it still showed 3 bars for power. It's a great unit for the size. I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Zen

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it a few days. Seems to make a difference already. Having knee pain. Went to physical therapy and they use a product something like this so when the other knee started hurting I started using this at home.
customer_reviews.author: clattea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Knee Pain
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product after getting a cortisone injection in my knee. I have had multiple surgeries (for a torn ACL and meniscus) and have done physical therapy and nothing has really fully worked to relieve my pain. However, when I have used the TEC.BEAN it has really helped to reduce my pain! I will definitely keep using this product and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Parks

customer_reviews.title: Just as effective as the one from the doctor with half the size and just as much power/results.
customer_reviews.text: I have a TENS provided by the doctor. This one is half the size and easier to use with the same strength, settings, and battery life. I have been wearing it today for over 7 hours. I have a severe back injury and it relieves the pain.
customer_reviews.author: PsychSchematics  🌟

customer_reviews.title: Great.  But missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Only bad thing I’ll say is mine was missing the charger and charging cord. Other than that, this worked great. Used it twice and ran down battery using it on my back and then elbow. Would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible. Came fully charged. I've used this several times for 30-40 minutes each time and still haven't had to charge it. VERY powerful with extremely easy to control settings and patterns. Excellent product. Came with a ton of different style pads and options for 2 or 4 pads at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn F.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I recently experienced a flare up of lower back pain/possible sciatica, and this TENS Unit was a lifesaver. Very easy to use, with a nice variety of modes. One tip - I would recommend using some sort of electrode gel with the pads to increase the lifespan (this isn't a criticism of this product in particular - I would recommend this for all electrode pads).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for pain if used regularly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife who has Sciatica. I was very skeptical at first. After using it several times a day for a week her symptoms started to diminish. After 2 weeks her pain was almost completely gone. Still skeptical, I tried it myself for lower back pain that I have been dealing with for years. Within a few weeks I was almost pain free. I now have been using this for almost a year and I now only have to use it about 2x per week to stay pain free and keep my muscles limber. I highly recommend this product for muscle pain and pain caused by a pinched nerve.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hodgins

customer_reviews.title: Way Better than I had expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Didn’t expect toooo much from this unit due to its Size and Cost,....but man was I wrong! This unit easily exceeded my expectations. Comparable to a a much bigger and more costly unit I had years back,...and probably with better and More features!
customer_reviews.author: pariahcarey

customer_reviews.title: This little device really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's hard to believe that something this powerful and effective is available commercially . . . and for such a low price! I did a lot of research before purchasing this unit. There is a lot of competition and a lot of mixed reviews about TENS units. I think I made an excellent choice! I have been experiencing problems with my lower back and am finding great relief from this unit. I used to spend a lot of money on massage therapy, and the results come pretty close to what I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: good pulsation, disappearing screen images
customer_reviews.text: unit does what it says, works great on my knees and back, however, after five months, screen is losing the images, can't see the timer or about 1/4 of the icons....keeps a good charge. another reviewer had the same problem. Company saw the review and promptly sent a replacement which I received yesterday, works just as good as the first one and the timer and icons are all present on the screen. We’ll see where it is at in another 5 monthsbut for now I am updating my stars to 5, great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but poor execution
customer_reviews.text: After using this device for a couple of months the screen images started disappearing. Now, there are no discernable images on the screen only a few remnants from previous images. Great concept but poor execution. I am not a big fan of unsolicited advice but I would advise a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. LaBorde

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Having back spasms on a constant. I bought this hoping it would help. Got it last night started using it and I feel the Releaf. It is small portable, has a carrying bag lots of extra pads. It came fully charged. Has everything you need. Buy it and start feeling great again
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Compares to units used by physical therapist
customer_reviews.text: After having a professional tens unit used on me during physical therapy, I really had my doubts about this small unit. I thought for the price I didn't have much to lose so decided to try it. The directions are bad, mixing different languages, and not explaining the different modes, BUT the unit is great. Much to my surprise it gives the same relief as the big PT units. I will be using this a lot. 4 stars instead of 5 only because of the directions
customer_reviews.author: M. West

customer_reviews.title: Super Lightweight Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after dropping and breaking the screen of my Tech Care. I am SO glad I broke the first machine because this one is so much better. Why? It is lightweight and comes with two cables. One of the cable splits into four (Yeah! Less to get tangled up in.) For a little machine it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!!! It works so well for cramps! I have debilitating menstrual cramps and this is my savior. It's small enough to hide under a big sweater so I can wear it at school, but it might take some creativity in summer. Big shirt with deep pockets in the summer? Either way I'm thrilled I have something that can get this agonized look off my face which seems to scare everyone
customer_reviews.author: L. Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Tec Bean tens unit seems seems very well made. My last tens unit was a piece of junk. I really like how it's rechargable. The packaging was well done. It actually feels well made like an original ipod.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I was skeptical about 16 different modes, but each one feels distinctly different. The pads work well and are very sticky. The only thing I wish was that the instruction manual defined the modes a bit better, but that's minor. It helps my pain tremendously and allows me to work longer.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Chajon

customer_reviews.title: Looked used, missing items.
customer_reviews.text: It looked used, open baggies with nothing in them, clear film from missing massage pads. Manuel had stains on it. Asked for a return, hope the next one does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: erika gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Execellent product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for home use in conjunction with physical therapy after rotator cuff surgery. It works as well as the very large t.e.n.s. unit that my therapist uses in her office, but it is small in size, very light weight, and easy to use. I'm going to order another one for my daughter. It has several modes and strengths, and can be used for pain relief on many other muscle groups - legs, upper and lower back, hips, elbows...I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy J.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the Tech Bean mini-massager! It is very easy to use, have many different settings.. I love the variety of the pads. The control panel is extremely easy and the automatic shut off is a great feature. I have been using it for two weeks now with a single charge. I feel much better with each use. My only complaint is that the little icons are not self explanatory, but it is very easy to scroll through them to find the one you want. I have already recommended this device to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this product from a family member and decided I had to get me one for my neck pain and also my husband has issues with his back so this has been amazing for both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Nermina S.

customer_reviews.title: Should have ordered a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product so far. Arrived on time, it was fully charged so I didn't have to wait to use it. Instructions included could be improved but I was able to assemble and use within a few min of opening. Options for mode and intensity are great, I will be able to customize accordingly. Felt relief after first use of an area in my back/shoulder blade area that I have been experiencing chronic pain in for over a year now. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: LKS019

customer_reviews.title: Helpful little gadget
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this as a stocking stuffer and it has been the most useful Christmas gift I have gotten. I am a nurse so I am able to use this small device while at work to help with tense muscles caused from charting or even moving patients. The customer service team is also great, I was having issues getting my warranty activated but they did it in a very quit manner.
customer_reviews.author: Breann Lynne Fruge Stracener

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: I love having this at home. I can use whenever and wherever I need. The multi functions are great, as well as being able to control the intensity. I am no longer use TENS at my PT office.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Baugh

product_meta.title: TENS Unit Muscle Stimulator with 8 Electrode Pads, TEC.Bean 16 Modes Rechargeable Electric Pulse Massager Pain Relief Tens Machine for Back, Neck, Arm, Leg & Knee - Home Office Sport
feature_bullets: Multi-functional Tens Massager: The Tens unit has 16 Preprogrammed Massage Modes for Pain and Muscle Relief. TENS unit help reduce pain and muscle spasms caused by a wide range of conditions including: arthritis, period pain, knee pain, neck pain, back pain, sports injuries.

Intensity & Portable: Use "+" and "-" buttons to increase/decrease intensity of the selected mode. 20 level Intensity allows you easily find one setting that suits your needs. This Tens muscle stimulator is small enough to fit in your back pocket. You can take it with you anywhere.
Adjustable Timer: The timer allows you to set a time of between 10-60 minutes, with the default set to 20 minutes. The timer indicator would keep you aware of the remaining time.

Rechargeable Battery: Up to 20 Hours of Continuous Use. It can be connected to wall charger, power bank or laptop USB port to charge. Don't worries about treatment interruption for dead AA batteries any more.
Warranty: The TEC.BEAN electric therapy machine backed up with 1 Years Warranty and 30 Days Money Back Guarantee. This TENS therapy device is very safe for you to use!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
